00252         inline long DbColumn::getLong(int32_t row) const { 
00253                 return atol(operator[](row).c_str());
00254         }
00255 
00256         inline int32_t DbColumn::getInt(int32_t row) const {
00257                 return (int32_t)getLong(row);
00258         }
00259 
00260         inline unsigned long DbColumn::getUnsignedLong(int32_t row) const { 
00261                 return ("NULL"==operator[](row) || ""==operator[](row))?-1L:atol(operator[](row).c_str());
00262         }
00263 
00264         inline uint32_t DbColumn::getUnsignedInt(int32_t row) const {
00265                 return (uint32_t)getUnsignedLong(row);
00266         }

00268         inline double DbColumn::getUnsignedDouble(int32_t row) const {
00269                 return ("NULL"==operator[](row) || ""==operator[](row))?-1.0:atof(operator[](row).c_str());
00270         }
00271

00273                 return atof(operator[](row).c_str());
00274         }

00281                 return (float)getDouble(row);
00282         }

00285                 return getString(row).c_str();

00288         inline std::string DbColumn::getString(int32_t row) const {
00289                 std::string v = operator[](row); 
00290                 return (v=="NULL") ? std::string() : v;
00291         }

00293         inline time_t DbColumn::getTime(int32_t row) const { 
00294                 return dateFromString(operator[](row));
00295         }
00296         
00297         inline long DbColumn::getIdentity(int32_t row) const {
00298                 std::string v=operator[](row); 
00299                 return ((v=="NULL"||v=="")?-1:atol(v.c_str()));
00300         }
00301 
00302         inline bool DbColumn::getBool(int32_t row) const {
00303                 return ("0"!=operator[](row));
00304         }
00305  
00306         inline bool DbColumn::isNull(int32_t row) const { 
00307                 return "NULL"==operator[](row) || "null"==operator[](row);
00308         }

00310         inline int32_t DbColumn::append(const std::string& value ){ 
00311                 push_back(value); 
00312                 return size();
00313         }
